scripts.android-release: rm -rf *.apk && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease --warning-mode all  && cd .. && mv android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk . && mv app-release.apk flip.apk
scripts.ios-clean: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && rm -rf flip.xcworkspace && cd .. && npm install && react-native link && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.android-clean: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && react-native link
